articles.description: iQOO has added another edition to its Z6-series with the launch of iQOO Z6 Lite 5G under Rs. 15,000. The highlight is that it packs the new Snapdragon 4 Gen 1 chipset, 50MP camera, and a lot more. Have a quick look here.
